sentence.Network_en: The world of the gods is anthropomorphic, an imitative projection of ours.
sentence.Network_cn: 神界是拟人化的，是模仿我们人类世界的一个投影。
鼓励模仿性犯罪的电影

sentence.Network_en: This disproves the theory that children are purely imitative.
sentence.Network_cn: 这证明认为儿童只会单纯地模仿的理论是站不住脚的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(67) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... imitational 模仿的 imitative 模仿的 imitator 模仿者.

list.abs: 医用术语中英文对照表-梁子同志 ... imitation 模拟，仿制 imitator 模拟器，仿真器 immediate 直接的，即刻的.
自考英语二词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... eclecticism n. 折衷主义 imitator n. 模仿者 guitar n. 六弦琴，吉他.
模仿(imitation)是在没有外界控制的条件下，个体受他人影响而仿效其言行，并使自己的言行与之相同或相似的过程。初中教学阶段， …
实用日常生活英语单词_日常用语 ... pearl 珍珠 imitation 仿制品 genuine 真的.
摹字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 同本义〖 copy;trace〗 仿效〖 imitate〗 描写,描绘〖 describe〗.
高二英语词汇表 ... reality n. 现实;实际存在的事物;真实 imitate vt. 模仿;仿效;仿制 virtual adj. 实质上的;实际上的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from late Latin imitativus, from the verb imitari (see imitate)

entry.def: People and animals who are imitative copy others' behaviour.

example.ex: Babies of eight to twelve months are generally highly imitative.
example.tran: 8 到 12 个月大的婴儿通常很爱模仿。

means.word_mean: 1. marked by or given to imitation;
2. (of words) formed in imitation of a natural sound;

sentences.sentence: "it was independently developed in more than one place as an onomatopoetic term"- Harry Hoijer

auth_sentence.content: Yet it's also far from poor, boring, static or imitative.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet it's also far from poor, boring, static or imitative.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet it's also far from poor, boring, static or imitative.

auth_sentence.content: Yes, most art is imitative, but it would be nice to hear more of where people come from as opposed to where they're coming from.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yes, most art is imitative, but it would be nice to hear more of where people come from as opposed to where they're coming from.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yes, most art is imitative, but it would be nice to hear more of where people come from as opposed to where they're coming from.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"人或物等"; 2. 表形容词,"……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: appreciate欣赏+ive……的→adj.感谢的,赞赏的
conjunct结合的,共同的+ive……的→adj.连接的
defect过失;缺点+ive……的→adj.有缺陷的
digest消化+ive……的→adj.消化的,有助消化的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 教育的,教育性的,教育上的
stems_affixes.word_buile: educate教育,培养,训练+ive……的→educative教育的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 选任的,有选举权的,随意选择的
stems_affixes.word_buile: elect选举,推选+ive……的→adj.选任的,有选举权的,随意选择的
imitate模仿+ive……的→imitative模仿的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 指示的,预示的,可表示的
stems_affixes.word_buile: indicate指示+ive……的→adj.指示的,预示的,可表示的
introduce引入,介绍+ive……的→introductive序文的,介绍的
loco地方+mot动+ive……的→从一个地方动到另一个地方→adj.运动的,移动的,运载的
meditate想,考虑+ive……的→adj.沉思的,冥想的
recept接受+ive……的→adj.善于接受的
regenerate改过自新的+ive……的→regenerative再生的
relate叙述,讲,使联系,发生关系+ive……的→relative相对的;相关的
subject主题+ive……的→adj.主观的,个人的
recuperate复原+ive……的→recuperative
capt抓+ive人或物等→抓住的人
defect过失;缺点+ive人或物等→n.有缺陷的人
fug逃+it走+ive人→n.逃犯,逃亡者
loco地方+mot动+ive物→从一个地方动到另一个地方→火车头
nat本土的+ive人或物等→n.本地人,本国人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 亲戚,关系词,相关物,亲缘植物
stems_affixes.word_buile: relate叙述,讲,使联系,发生关系+ive人或物等→n.亲戚,关系词,相关物,亲缘植物

sentences.en: This disproves the theory that children are purely imitative.
sentences.cn: 这证明认为儿童只会单纯地模仿的理论是站不住脚的。
